title: NEIGRIHMS Jobs 2026 - Apply Online for 02 Project Nurse, Project Technical Support Posts
description: The North Eastern Indira Gandhi Regional Institute of Health and Medical Sciences (NEIGRIHMS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02Â Project Nurse and Project Technical Support Jobs. Candidates who completed their GNM, Diploma, and 12th can apply for the NEIGRIHMS Jobs 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have men...
